query:
ALTER TABLE membershipTiers 
ADD COLUMN priceOneTime INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN foundingPriceOneTime INT NULL,
ADD COLUMN stripePriceIdOneTime VARCHAR(255) NULL,
ADD COLUMN workshopTokensPerMonth INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN hasRecordingAccess INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
